chicken-breast.title: Air Fryer Chicken Breast
instructions: Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and your choice of spices.
Place chicken in the air fryer basket and cook for 10-15 minutes, flipping halfway through.

chicken-wings.title: Air Fryer Chicken Wings
instructions: Season wings with salt, pepper, and spices or sauce of your choice.
Cook for 25 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through for even cooking.

beef-steak.title: Air Fryer Beef Steak
instructions: Season the steak with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Cook for 10-12 minutes, flipping halfway through, until desired doneness is reached.

pork-chops.title: Air Fryer Pork Chops
instructions: Season pork chops with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Cook for 10-12 minutes, flipping halfway through.

salmon-filet.title: Air Fryer Salmon Filet
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
